d.en: measure with or as if with scales
d.ro: A determina greutatea unui corp cu ajutorul cântarului, al balanței, al basculei
d.ja: 目盛りを使用するかのように、測定する

d.en: the act of someone who fishes as a diversion
d.el: το κυνήγι ψαριών στη θάλασσα ή σε γλυκά νερά, ως ψυχαγωγική δραστηριότητα
d.ro: Acțiunea de a pescui ca divertisment
d.ja: 気晴らしとして魚を釣る人の行為

d.en: the occupation of catching fish for a living
d.de: die Beschäftigung mit dem Fang von Fischen zum Lebensunterhalt
d.ro: ocupația de a prinde pește pentru a-și asigura existența
d.ja: 生計のために魚を捕える仕事

d.en: fishing with a hook and line (and usually a pole)
d.el: το ψάρεμα που γίνεται με καλάμι ψαρέματος, πετονιά και αγκίστρι
d.ro: Sportul care constă în a prinde pești cu undița.
d.ja: つり針と糸で釣る（通常竿と一緒に）

d.en: a fisherman who uses a hook and line
d.da: person der fisker med (stang og) snøre hvortil der…
d.de: ein Fischer, der einen Haken und eine Leine benutzt
d.ro: Pescar care pescuiește cu undița
d.id: seorang nelayan yang menggunakan pengait dan benang
d.ja: 釣針と釣糸を使う漁師

d.en: a person who seeks wealth through marriage
d.ja: 結婚によって富を得ようとする人

d.en: ship equipped to detect and then destroy or neutralize or remove marine mines
d.ja: 水中地雷を探知し、破壊、無力化あるいは除去するための装備をもつ船

d.en: a crane-like device (usually one of a pair) for suspending or lowering equipment (as a lifeboat)
d.da: lille kran el. bøjle der sammen med en anden, tils…
d.ro: macara la încărcarea și descărcarea navelor
d.ja: （救命ボートのような）道具を吊したり下ろしたりするためのクレーン状の装置（通例一対のうちの片方）

d.en: catch or try to catch fish or shellfish
d.de: Fische oder Schalentiere fangen oder versuchen zu fangen
d.it: catturare pesci o altri animali marini o d'acqua dolce per cibarsene o farne commercio
d.ro: A prinde pește sau alte animale acvatice (comestibile), de obicei cu ajutorul unor instrumente speciale
d.ja: 魚または貝をつかむか、またはつかまえようとする

d.en: 100 pesewas equal 1 cedi in Ghana
d.ro: Subunitate monetară din Ghana
d.ja: ガーナで100ペセワは、1セディと同価である

d.en: the basic unit of money in Colombia; equal to 100 centavos
d.ja: コロンビアの通貨の基本単位; 100センタボと同価

d.en: the basic unit of money in Cuba; equal to 100 centavos
d.ja: キューバの通貨の基本単位; 100センタボと同価

d.en: the basic unit of money in the Dominican Republic; equal to 100 centavos
d.ro: Unitate monetară din Republica Dominicană
d.ja: ドミニカ共和国の通貨の基本的単位; 00センタボと同価

d.en: the basic unit of money in the Philippines; equal to 100 centavos
d.ro: unitate monetară din Filipine
d.ja: フィリピンのお金の基本的な単位; 100センタボと同価

d.en: the basic unit of money in Mexico; equal to 100 centavos
d.ja: メキシコの通貨の基本単位; 100センタボと同価

d.en: a vessel for fishing; often has a well to keep the catch alive
d.de: ein Schiff zum Fischen; hat oft einen Brunnen, um den Fang am Leben zu erhalten
d.it: imbarcazione o nave attrezzata per la pesca
d.ro: barcă folosită la pescuit
d.ja: 釣り用の船; しばしば獲物を生かしておく水槽を持っている

d.en: a representation of Christ's nativity in the stable at Bethlehem
d.it: rappresentazione della natività di Cristo, fatta con delle opere pittoriche o con statuine
d.ja: ベツレヘムの馬小屋の中のキリスト生誕の像

d.en: formerly the basic unit of money in Spain; equal to 100 centimos
d.ro: unitatea monetară a Spaniei
d.ja: 以前、スペインにおける基本通貨単位; 100センチモと同価

d.en: a slight but appreciable amount
d.ro: Adaos nesubstanțial dar apreciabil. " La mâncarea asta ar trebui să adaugi un strop de usturoi "
d.ja: わずかであるけれどもはっきりわかる量

d.en: a squeeze with the fingers
d.ro: acțiunea de a apuca cu degetele
d.ja: 指で圧力を加えること

d.en: a small sharp bite or snip
d.ro: Atenționare prin apucarea și strângerea ușoară a unei bucăți de piele.
d.ja: 小さく鋭く切り取ること、またはつまむこと

d.en: eat like a bird
d.ro: (Fam.; despre oameni) A mânca dintr-un aliment, luând numai câte puțin, de ici și de colo
d.ja: 小食である

d.en: the act of tickling
d.ro: Acțiunea de a (se) gâdila
d.ja: くすぐる行為

d.en: a tingling feeling of excitement (as from teasing or tickling)
d.ja: （じらすなどして）呼び起こす興奮

d.en: touch (a body part) lightly so as to excite the surface nerves and cause uneasiness, laughter, or spasmodic movements
d.ro: A produce, prin atingeri ușoare asupra unor părți ale corpului, o senzație particulară, care provoacă cuiva un râs convulsiv nestăpânit
d.ja: 表面神経を興奮させ、不安、笑いまたは発作的な運動を引き起こすために、（身体の部位）軽く触れる

d.en: a general disposition to look on the dark side and to expect the worst in all things
d.ro: predispoziție de a vedea totul într-o lumină sumbră, deprimantă
d.ja: 全てに対して暗い面を見、最悪を予期する全体的な性質

d.en: a feeling of melancholy apprehension
d.ro: sentiment de întristare, îndurerare, amărăciune, supărare
d.ja: 憂鬱な不安の気持ち

d.en: the feeling that things will turn out badly
d.it: atteggiamento di chi pensa che tutto debba andare male
d.ro: sentiment că lucrurile se vor încheia rău
d.id: perasaan bahwa segala sesuatu akan menjadi buruk
d.ja: 物事が悪くなると思う気持ち

d.en: expecting the worst possible outcome
d.ro: Care manifestă pesimism, care se bazează pe pesimism
d.ja: 最悪の結果を予想するさま

d.en: a person who expects the worst
d.el: αυτός που δεν ελπίζει σε τίποτα, που περιμένει πάντα το χειρότερο
d.ro: Persoană predispusă la pesimism
d.ja: 最悪の事態を予期する人

d.en: a serious (sometimes fatal) infection of rodents caused by Yersinia pestis and accidentally transmitted to humans by the bite of a flea that has bitten an infected animal
d.de: eine schwere (manchmal tödliche) Infektion von Nagetieren, die durch Yersinia pestis verursacht und durch den Biss eines Flohs, der ein infiziertes Tier gebissen hat, versehentlich auf den Menschen übertragen wird
d.he: מחלה זיהומית מדבקת, לעיתים קטלנית, המועברת על ידי חולדות
d.ro: boală infecțioasă și epidemică foarte gravă, caracterizată prin febră mare, diaree, delir, tumefacții ale ganglionilor etc.
d.id: infeksi rodensia serius disebabkan oleh Yersinia pestis dan tertular ke manusia
d.ja: ペスト菌によって起き、感染した動物の血を吸ったノミによって偶然感染する深刻な感染症（時には致命的な）

d.en: either of two acute viral diseases of domestic fowl; characterized by refusal to eat and high temperature and discoloration of the comb
d.ja: 家禽の二種類の急性ウイルス性疾患のいずれか; 拒食と高体温、とさかの退色が特徴

d.en: the most common form of the plague in humans; characterized by chills, prostration, delirium and the formation of buboes in the armpits and groin; does not spread from person to person
d.ro: ciumă (sau pestă) manifestată prin abcese
d.sl: huda nalezljiva bolezen, ki prizadene različne dele telesa
d.ja: 人間の疫病で最も一般の形; 腋の下と鼠蹊部の横根の寒気、平身低頭、精神錯乱、および構成で、特徴付けられます; 人から人まで広がらない

d.en: the epidemic form of bubonic plague experienced during the Middle Ages when it killed nearly half the people of western Europe
d.ro: boală epidemică ce a ucis milioane d eoameni în Evul Mediu
d.sl: označujemo epidemijo, domnevno pljučne kuge, ki se je pojavila v 14. stoletju po vsej Evropi
d.ja: 中世に流行した流行性の腺ペスト

d.en: a rapidly progressive and frequently fatal form of the plague that can spread through the air from person to person; characterized by lung involvement with chill, bloody expectoration and high fever
d.ja: 空気を通じて人から人まで広がる可能性がある疫病の急速に進歩的で頻繁に致命的な形; 寒気、血痰、および高熱を伴う肺病変によって特徴づけられる

d.en: an especially dangerous and generally fatal form of the plague in which infecting organisms invade the bloodstream; does not spread from person to person
d.ja: 起炎菌が血流に侵入する疫病の、特に危険で一般に致命的な形; 人から人へ広がらない

d.en: any of the short curved hairs that grow from the edges of the eyelids
d.ro: Fiecare dintre firișoarele de păr de pe marginea unei pleoape
d.id: rambut pendek melengkung yang tumbuh dari tepi kelopak mata
d.ja: まぶたの縁から生える短い湾曲した毛の総称

d.en: a sauce typically served with pasta; contains crushed basil leaves and garlic and pine nuts and Parmesan cheese in olive oil
d.ja: 通常パスタで出されるソース; オリーブ油に、押しつぶされたバジルの葉、ニンニク、松の実及びパルメザン・チーズを含む

d.en: a unit of information equal to 1024 tebibytes or 2^50 bytes
d.ja: 1024テビバイトまたは2^50バイトと等しい情報の単位

d.en: a pouch for carrying pipe tobacco
d.ja: パイプ用のタバコを入れる袋

d.en: make noise as if chattering away
d.ro: A scoate zgomote neinteligibile și repetate
d.ja: あたかもぺちゃくちゃしゃべるかのように雑音を出す

d.en: laugh loudly and harshly
d.ro: a râde tare, zgomotos
d.ja: 騒々しく、荒々しく笑う

d.en: laugh boisterously
d.it: ridere sguaiatamente, anche in modo sarcastico e beffardo
d.ro: a râde foarte tare, zgomotos
d.ja: ばか笑いする、高笑いする

d.en: United States folk singer who was largely responsible for the interest in folk music in the 1960s (born in 1919)
d.ja: 米国のフォークシンガーで、主に1960年代にフォーク・ミュージックに対して大きな役割を果たした（1919年生まれ）

d.en: German architect known for his simple utilitarian factory buildings (1868-1940)
d.ja: 彼の簡単な実用的な工場建物のために知られているドイツの建築家（1868年−1940年）

d.en: United States industrialist who built the first American locomotive; founded Cooper Union in New York City to offer free courses in the arts and sciences (1791-1883)
d.ro: Industriaș american care a construit prima locomotivă
d.ja: 米国の実業家で、最初のアメリカの機関車を造った; ニューヨーク市にクーパー・ユニオンを設立し、文科系と理科系にフリーコースを提供する（1791年−1883年）

d.en: United States actor (born in Hungary) noted for playing sinister roles (1904-1964)
d.ja: 米国の俳優（ハンガリー生まれ）で、悪党の役を演じたことで知られる（1904年−1964年）

d.en: British immunologist (born in Brazil) who studied tissue transplants and discovered that the rejection of grafts was an immune response (1915-1987)
d.ja: 英国の免疫学者（ブラジル生まれ）で、組織移植を研究し、移植片の不認可が免疫反応であることを発見した（1915年−1987年）

d.en: Dutch colonist who bought Manhattan from the Native Americans for the equivalent of $24 (1580-1638)
d.ja: オランダの入植者で、24ドルに等しい額でアメリカインディアンからマンハッタンを買った（1580年−1638年）

d.en: British actor (born in Ireland in 1932)
d.ro: Actor britanic născut în 1932
d.ja: 英国人の俳優（1932年、アイルランド生まれ）

d.en: the main character in a play and novel by J. M. Barrie; a boy who won't grow up
d.id: karakter utama dalam drama dan novel karya JM Barrie
d.ja: J.M.バリーの演劇および小説の主役; 成長しない少年

d.en: a boyish or immature man; after the boy in Barrie's play who never grows up
d.ja: 幼稚な、あるいは成熟していない男性; バリーの戯曲に出てくる、決して大人にならない少年にちなんで

d.en: prolific Flemish baroque painter; knighted by the English king Charles I (1577-1640)
d.sl: flamski slikar, * 28. ali 29. junij 1577, Siegen, Vestfalija, † 30. maj 1640, Antwerpen, Belgija
d.ja: 多産なフランダースのバロック画家; 英国王チャールズ1世によってナイト爵に叙された（1577年−1640年）

d.en: English comic actor (1925-1980)
d.ro: actor comic englez (1925-1980)
d.ja: 英国の喜劇俳優（1925年−1980年）

d.en: the last Dutch colonial administrator of New Netherland; in 1664 he was forced to surrender the colony to England (1592-1672)
d.ja: ニュー・ネーデルラントの最後のオランダ植民地管理者; 1664年、居住地を英国に引き渡すことを強要された（1592年−1672年）

d.en: one praying humbly for something
d.ro: Persoană care se milogește pentru a obține ceva.
d.ja: へりくだった態度で何かを請い願う人

d.en: limited in size or scope
d.ckb: لە قەبارە و بواردا دیاری کراو
d.el: περιορισμένος σε μέγεθος, σε διαστάσεις ή σε δυνατότητες
d.ro: Care este lipsit de însemnătate (ca mărime, cantitate, valoare).
d.sq: një masë e limituar ose një fushë e limituar
d.ja: サイズまたは範囲で制限される

d.en: (of children and animals) young, immature
d.ro: de vărstă fragedă
d.ja: （子供や動物について）若くて、未熟なさま

d.en: young of any of various fur-bearing animals
d.ja: 様々な毛皮獣の子

d.en: a farmer on a small farm
d.ja: 小さな農場の農夫

d.en: a member of the lower middle class
d.ja: 下級の中流階級の一員

d.en: a businessman who runs a business employing less than 100 people
d.ro: Comerciant care dezvoltă o afacere în care sunt angajate mai puțin de 100 de persoane
d.ja: 雇用者数100人未満の会社を経営する実務家

d.en: a river that rises in northeastern Wyoming and flows through Montana and South Dakota to join the Missouri River in North Dakota
d.ja: ワイオミング州北東部に発する川で、モンタナ州とサウスダコタ州を流れ、ノースダコタ州でミズーリ川に注ぐ

d.en: the property of having a relatively small size
d.el: το να έχει κάποιος, κάτι μικρές διαστάσεις
d.he: תכונתו של הדבר הקטן באופן יחסי
d.it: l'essere piccolo o comunque di dimensioni inferiori a quelle consuete
d.ro: proprietatea de a avea dimensiuni mici
d.ja: 比較的小さいサイズであるという特質

d.en: a weight used to hold down a stack of papers
d.ro: obiect greu de birou care se așază peste hârtii
d.ja: 多くの書類を抑えるのに用いられる重

d.en: walk clumsily
d.ro: A merge stângaci și dizgrațios
d.ja: 不器用に歩く

d.en: snuggle and lie in a position where one person faces the back of the others
d.ja: すり寄り、1人が他人の背中に面している位置に横たわる

d.en: someone who kisses
d.ro: Persoană care se pupă foarte mult
d.ja: キスをする人

d.en: an enthusiastic kiss
d.ro: Sărut zgomotos
d.ja: 情熱的なキス

d.en: relatively small long-winged tube-nosed bird that flies far from land
d.da: mågelignende havfugl med lange, spidse vinger og y…
d.ro: Pasăre marină de mărimea unui porumbel, cu nările situate la capătul unor tuburi cornoase de pe cioc, care trăiește în jurul Mării Mediterane
d.ja: 陸地から遠く離れて飛行する、長い翼と管状の鼻を持つ比較的小型の鳥

d.en: the process of turning some plant material into stone by infiltration with water carrying mineral particles without changing the original shape
d.ja: ある植物の素材が、元の形を変えることなく、鉱物粒子を持つ水が浸透することで石に変化する過程

d.en: cause to become stonelike or stiff or dazed and stunned
d.ro: a face să rămână nemișcat de frică, de spaimă sau de uimire
d.ja: 石のような、固い、ぼうっとしていて、呆然とさせる

d.en: the branch of geology that studies rocks: their origin and formation and mineral composition and classification
d.de: Teilgebiet der Geologie, das sich mit den Gesteinen befasst: mit ihrer Entstehung und Bildung sowie mit ihrer mineralischen Zusammensetzung und Klassifizierung
d.el: επιστημονικός κλάδος που μελετά τη χημική σύσταση, τον ιστό και την υφή, την εμφάνιση και την προέλευσή τους σε σχέση με τις φυσικοχημικές συνθήκες και τις γεωλογικές διεργασίες
d.ro: Ramură a geologiei care se ocupă cu studiul rocilor din punctul de vedere al compoziției lor mineralogice și chimice, al formării lor, al transformărilor pe care le suferă, al răspândirii lor în scoarța Pământului etc.
d.ja: 岩を研究する地質学の分野：それらの起源、形状、組成および分類

d.en: a semisolid mixture of hydrocarbons obtained from petroleum; used in medicinal ointments and for lubrication
d.ro: Substanță vâscoasă obținută prin rafinarea fracțiunilor grele de la distilarea țițeiului, ori prin amestecarea cu parafină a unor uleiuri, minerale, folosită ca unsoare pentru pielărie, ca lubrifiant etc. sau (în stare pură) ca unguent în farmacie și în cosmetică
d.ja: 石油から採られる炭化水素類の半固体の混合物; 医薬用の軟膏や潤滑油につかわれる

d.en: lampreys as distinguished from hagfishes
d.ja: メクラウナギと区別されるヤツメウナギ

d.en: lampreys
d.ro: animale marine care trăiesc îngropate în nămol, de unde ies și atacă peștii de talie mică sau alte animale mici de apă
d.ja: ヤツメウナギ

d.en: a carving or line drawing on rock (especially one made by prehistoric people)
d.ja: 石への彫刻または線画（特に有史以前の人々によって作られた）

d.en: the act of putting forth your own opinions in a boastful or inconsiderate manner that implies you feel superior to others
d.ja: 自分の意見を自慢げで無遠慮に押し付け、他人より優れていると言い張ること

d.en: edible marine bivalve having a fluted fan-shaped shell that swim by expelling water from the shell in a series of snapping motions
d.it: mollusco con valve sottili percorse da striature regolari
d.ro: scoică marină comestibilă, cu cochilia în formă de evantai alb
d.ja: 一連の噛みつくような動作で殻から水を吐くことで泳ぐ、縦溝のある扇形の貝殻をもつ食用の海洋二枚貝

d.en: a shell of a scallop
d.ja: ホタテガイの貝殻

d.en: edible muscle of mollusks having fan-shaped shells; served broiled or poached or in salads or cream sauces
d.ro: Mușchiul comestibil al scoicilor, învelit de două valve calcaroase.
d.ja: 扇形の殻がある軟体動物の食用の筋肉; 煮たり、ゆでたり、サラダであるいはクリームソースと共に出される

d.en: a minute red or purple spot on the surface of the skin as the result of tiny hemorrhages of blood vessels in the skin (as in typhoid fever)
d.de: ein winziger roter oder violetter Fleck auf der Hautoberfläche als Folge winziger Blutungen von Blutgefäßen in der Haut (wie bei Typhus)
d.ja: 皮膚（腸チフスのように）の血管の小さい出血がもたらす皮膚の表面の微小な赤か紫斑

d.en: any of numerous tropical herbs having fluted funnel-shaped flowers
d.ro: plantă erbacee decorativă, cu flori mari, divers colorate și cu miros plăcut
d.ja: 縦溝のあるじょうご型の花をもつ様々な熱帯性草本の総称

d.en: (prosody) a group of 2 or 3 syllables forming the basic unit of poetic rhythm
d.it: nella metrica classica, la più piccola unità ritmica di un verso, formata da almeno due sillabe
d.ro: Unitate ritmică a unui vers, compusă dintr-un număr fix de silabe lungi și scurte sau accentuate și neaccentuate.
d.ja: 詩のリズムの基本単位を形成する、2、3音節のグループ

d.en: a note acknowledging the source of a published photograph
d.ro: Notă care indică sursa unei fotografii publicată
d.ja: 公表された写真の出典を示す注記

d.en: the mark of Satan
d.ja: 悪魔のしるし

d.en: fungal infection of the feet
d.ro: infecție fungică afectând picioarele
d.ja: 足に生じる真菌性感染症

d.en: any of 16 white and 16 black pieces used in playing the game of chess
d.el: κάθε ένα από τα μικρά τεμάχια με τα οποία ένας παίχτης μετέχει στο παιχνίδι κινώντας τα σύμφωνα με τις επιτρεπόμενες κινήσεις
d.ro: una din cele 16 piese albe sau 16 piese negre ale jocului de șah
d.sl: poleg šahovnice del igralnega kompleta za igranje šaha
d.ja: チェスをするのに使用される16の白と16の黒の駒のどれか

d.en: any of numerous plants widely cultivated for their showy single or double red or pink or white flowers
d.it: pianta ornamentale con fiori simili a rose
d.ro: Nume dat unor plante erbacee, cu flori mari, roșii, roz sau albe.
d.ja: ピンクまたは白の一重あるいは八重咲きの華やかな花が目的で広く栽培されている植物

d.en: (chess) the least powerful piece; moves only forward and captures only to the side; it can be promoted to a more powerful piece if it reaches the 8th rank
d.ro: Fiecare dintre cele șaisprezece piese de cea mai mică valoare de la un joc de șah, așezate la începutul partidei, înaintea celorlalte piese
d.ja: 最も弱い駒; 前方にのみ動き、横にあるもののみ捕獲する; 8番目の列までいくと、より強い駒に昇格できる

d.en: a laborer who carries supplies to masons or bricklayers
d.ja: 石工か煉瓦積み職人まで物資を運ぶ労働者

d.en: a slipper that is soft and wool (for babies)
d.de: ein Pantoffel, der weich und aus Wolle ist (für Babys)
d.ro: încălțăminte ușoară pentru copii mici
d.ja: やわらかく羊毛であるスリッパ（赤ちゃんのための）

d.en: 100 pfennigs formerly equaled 1 Deutsche Mark in Germany
d.ro: monedă germană
d.ja: 100ペニヒは以前ドイツの1ドイツマルクと等しかった

d.en: small furry Australian arboreal marsupials having long usually prehensile tails
d.ro: Mamifer marsupial din America de Nord, cu o blană cenușie : sarigă
d.ja: 長くて普通は物を掴むのに適した尾を持つ、毛皮で覆われたオーストラリア産の樹上性小型有袋動物

d.en: United States physicist who studied the electronic structure of magnetic and disordered systems (1923-)
d.ro: fizician american născut în 1923 care a studiat structura electronică a sistemelor magnetice
d.sl: ameriški fizik in nobelovec, * 13. december 1923, Indianapolis, Indiana
d.ja: 米国の物理学者で、磁気および無秩序系の電子構造を研究した（1923年−）

d.en: French royal architect who built the Tuileries Palace and Gardens in Paris for Catherine de Medicis (1515-1570)
d.ja: フランスの王室建築家で、カトリーヌ・ド・メディシスのためにパリにチュイルリー宮殿と庭園を建てた（1515年−1570年）

d.en: tough cynical detective (one of the early detective heroes in American fiction) created by Raymond Chandler
d.ro: Personaj american creat de Raymond Chandler, care întruchipează un detectiv cinic
d.id: detektif sinis yang merupakan detektif awal dalam fiksi Amerika
d.ja: レイモンド・チャンドラーによって創造されたタフでシニカルな刑事（アメリカのフィクションの初期の刑事英雄のうちの1人）

d.en: United States writer whose novels portray middle-class Jewish life (born in 1933)
d.ro: Sciitor nord-american ale cărui romane ilustrează viața clasei mijlocii iudaice (născut în 1933)
d.ja: 米国の作家で、小説で中産階級のユダヤ人の生活を描いた（1933年生まれ）

d.en: German physicist who studied cathode rays (1862-1947)
d.sl: madžarski fizik in nobelovec, * 7. junij 1862, Bratislava, Slovaška, tedaj Avstro-Ogrska, † 20. maj 1947, Messelhausen, Nemčija
d.ja: ドイツ人の物理学者で、陰極線を研究した（1862年−1947年）

d.en: German theologian and Luther's successor as leader of the Reformation in Germany (1497-1560)
d.ja: ドイツの神学者で、ドイツでの改革のリーダーとしてのルーサーの後継者（1497年−1560年）
